alert.note: Alert for Clark; Greene; Miami; Montgomery (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 6:53PM EDT until June 11 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clark County in west central Ohio... Northwestern Greene County in west central Ohio... Central Montgomery County in west central Ohio... South central Miami County in west central Ohio... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 653 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Carrollton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Dayton, Kettering, Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Fairborn, Trotwood, Miamisburg, Springboro, Vandalia, Englewood, Bellbrook, Moraine, Oakwood, Yellow Springs, Wright-Patterson Afb, West Carrollton, Enon, Riverside, Clayton and Union. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 30 and 44. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 42 and 65. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
